description.en: The main concepts of linguistics are in the focus of consideration: phoneme, morpheme, lexeme, sentence, syntagm etc. - and their specifics in the Russian language. Language as a system of special signs. The linguistic units, their functions and correlation. Peculiarities and universal characteristics of the various languages.
description.et: Keel kui märgisüsteem. Vaadeldakse keeleteaduse põhimõisteid: foneem, morfeem, lekseem, sõnaühend, lause etc. - ja nende spetsiifikat vene keeles. Keeleühikute vastastikune mõju ja nende funktsioneerimine. Erinevate keelte omapära ja üldjooned.

objectives.en: To give the students general notion on the different linguistic units and categories, language as a system of special signs; to consider the main tendencies in the development of the present-day Russian linguistuics.
objectives.et: Tutvustada üliõpilastele erinevaid keeleühikuid ja kategooriaid, keelt kui märgisüsteemi; vaadelda tänapäeva vene keeleteaduse arenemise põhisuundi.

learning_outcomes.en: Student who successfully completed the course
- knows the history of Russian linguistics;
- is able to orientate in the main issues of Russian linguistics;
- knows the necessary Russian linguistic terms and is able to use them.
learning_outcomes.et: - teab vajalikke keeleteaduslikke vene termineid ja oskab neid kasutada;

learning_outcomes.en: - uses theoretical knowledge in further study;
- knows how to conduct an academic discussion;
learning_outcomes.et: - teab, kuidas akadeemilist arutelu läbi viia.

learning_outcomes.en: - can critically analyze his / her language skills and speech usage.
learning_outcomes.et: - suudab oma keeleteadmisi ja kõnekasutust kriitiliselt analüüsida.

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)
